name: LFG Token
description:
GAMΞRSΞ is the new home for NFT gaming and the metaverse social economy. Our cross-chain, cross-platform, and cross-verse solutions are unifying the fragmented NFT gaming ecosystem.
GAMΞRSΞ is creating the first-ever NFT Gaming Social Ecosystem allowing gamers to explore popular NFT games aggregated and brought together in a single social marketplace.
GAMΞRSΞ is the LFG (“Looking For Group”) platform for the entire NFT gaming industry, and we will be around for gamers of all shades and hues, no matter which title holds the #1 spot. As a social NFT Gaming platform, we are unique with our share-to-earn social-fi model which allows creators and gamers to monetize. GAMΞRSΞ unites gamers in a single, fun community, constantly adapting to the newest and most viral trends.
